nodes.text: The Tyn Syndicate were a group for whom the hunter Ro Thran caught a bull krykna. The hunter Winloss mentioned the syndicate upon discovering Ro Thran's corpse on the world of X3-299-11 during the reign of the Galactic Empire.
The Tyn Syndicate was first mentioned in the comic book Doctor Aphra Annual 2, which was written by Simon Spurrier and released on September 5 2018.
